charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking in the
forest, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Marnie receiving
something from a rising star’s Delibird.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0200_1: Here, Morpeko. Have a Berry seed.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0300_1:
Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Why do ya
look so shocked? Somethin’ wrong?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0400_1:
Morpeko’s appearance? Oh, did ya see all that
just now?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0500_1:
My partner Pokémon, Morpeko, changes
appearance based on how hungry she is.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0600_1:
The black fur you just saw was her in Hangry
Mode. She gets hangry and has a real
nasty temper.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0700_1: I usually carry around Berry seeds just in case...
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0800_1:
but I ran out while walkin’ around and lookin’ in
all the apparel shops in town.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_0900_1:
It’s OK, though, because the sync pair I was just
talkin’ to shared some of theirs with me!
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_1000_1:
You’re still hungry? I guess I’ve gotta go search
for some Berries, then...
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_1100_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], help me look for
a bit, would ya?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0401_1300_1: Thanks! Let’s get goin’, then, shall we?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0402_1500_1:
Glad to hear it. It’d be a great help to have
someone searchin’ with me.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_1600_1:
Phew. We sure gathered a lot. But I think we
need just a few more...
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0401_1800_1:
Yeah. My legs got tired real quick, too, when I
first started doin’ this.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0302_1900_1: I bet this is great training for us.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0402_2000_1: I bet you’re right. It’s practically like workin’ out.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2100_1:
It doesn’t bother me anymore, though. I’ve been
doin’ this ever since I teamed up with Morpeko
when I was five years old, y’know.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2200_1:
My big brother caught my Morpeko for me way
back then, when all I did was cry all the time.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2300_1:
Ever since then, Morpeko and I have always been
there for each other.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2400_1:
I still find myself doin’ silly stuff like this since
Morpeko can get so hangry sometimes...
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2500_1:
But I bet you won’t find any sync pair out there
with a bond stronger than ours.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2600_1:
Well, I guess all the sync pairs here on Pasio
probably say the same thing, huh?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_2700_1:
So I know I can’t just rely on our bond. We’ve
gotta keep trainin’ to get stronger if we wanna
beat all the other sync pairs here.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0401_2900_1:
Thanks! I’ll be sure to cheer for you when you
battle, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0302_3000_1: My partner and I won’t lose!
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_0402_3100_1:
We don’t plan to lose to you, either! We need to
have a proper battle one of these days!
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_3200_1: OK, then. I guess we’ve gathered about enough.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_3300_1:
Thanks for your help, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
With this many Berries, we should be fine for a
little while at least.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_3400_1: Hmm... How can I thank you?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_3500_1:
I know! I’ll be your trainin’ partner the next time
you go out to train.
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_3600_1:
We can cheer each other on and both get stronger
together. It’ll be great, y’know?
charaepi_ch0245_00_mary/2301_1201_3700_1:
Be sure to tell me next time you go out to train.
It’s a promise—got it?
